content: the sedge stitch is a beautifully textured stitch it is made up with the basic simple crochet stitches its a combination of single crochets half double crochets and double crochets worked in a single stitch this gives the rich texture the sedge stitch is reversible this make it a great stitch for making crochet scarves potholders and crocheted blankets materials used - 4 ply cotton knitting yarn 4 mm crochet hook crochet terms used - us crochet terms checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/vactlv3s9bm
